overviewDescription: Down by the Sea is a charming and cozy 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom pet-friendly home in Oak Island, NC. It is currently rented and not available for new inquiries at this time. Perfect for families or individuals seeking a comfortable extended stay, this home is a short golf cart ride or drive from public beach access. Your coastal retreat includes all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay: fenced yard for dogs and kids, fully equipped kitchen, and comfortable sleeping for up to 6 guests.

faqs.question: How far is Down by the Sea from Oak Island beach?
faqs.answer: Down by the Sea is a short 5-minute drive or golf cart ride to the nearest beach access. Many guests enjoy renting a golf cart to enhance their island experience and make beach trips easy and fun.

faqs.question: Is this Oak Island rental pet-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes! We welcome up to 2 pets with a $50 pet fee per stay. The property features a fenced yard that provides a safe space for dogs to play. Please keep pets off furniture and clean up after them.

faqs.question: What makes Down by the Sea a good value?
faqs.answer: Down by the Sea offers all the amenities of higher-priced rentals‚Äî3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, full kitchen, beach equipment, fenced yard, and comfortable furnishings‚Äîat a more affordable rate. It's perfect for budget-conscious families who don't want to compromise on comfort.

faqs.question: How many guests can this vacation rental accommodate?
faqs.answer: Down by the Sea sleeps up to 6 guests with 3 bedrooms (2 queens and 1 twin).

faqs.question: What amenities are included?
faqs.answer: The rental includes WiFi, central air conditioning, full kitchen with modern appliances, washer/dryer, Smart TV, beach chairs and umbrella, beach wagon, outdoor shower, gas grill, fenced yard, and parking for 2+ cars.

faqs.question: Should I rent a golf cart for my Oak Island vacation?
faqs.answer: Many of our guests find that renting a golf cart adds to the fun of their Oak Island vacation! It makes beach trips easier and is a great way to explore the island. We have parking space for golf carts.

faqs.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faqs.answer: Check-in is at 4:00 PM and check-out is at 10:00 AM. This gives us adequate time to thoroughly clean and prepare the home for each guest.

faqs.question: Why book direct instead of using vacation rental platforms?
faqs.answer: When you book directly through our website, you avoid the hefty service fees charged by platforms like Airbnb and VRBO‚Äîsaving you money. You also get direct communication with us, the owners, for personalized service and local recommendations.

importantInfo.title: Pet Policy
importantInfo.description: We welcome your pets! The fenced backyard provides a safe space for dogs to play. Please keep pets off furniture and always clean up after them.

importantInfo.title: Transportation Tip
importantInfo.description: Consider renting a golf cart for easy beach access and exploring Oak Island! Many guests find this adds to the fun island experience.
